level.heading: Authority of Mayor.
level.text: Nothing in this chapter shall restrict the authority of the Mayor of the District of Columbia to inspect, condemn, denature, destroy, seize, or remove food for human consumption pursuant to ยง 22-2903 [repealed].

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-39
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-39, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 48-301.
